NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
NCS application - your next steps
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian of (Contact.FirstName)")},
Your admin fee for {!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS application
Thank you for your application for {!Contact.FirstName} to take part in National Citizen Service (NCS) as part of their course. We have temporarily saved them a provisional place on the programme but you now need to pay your admin fee, which will be a maximum of £50.
To pay, please: log in to our website at bookings.ncsthechallenge.org (If you have forgotten your log in details, you can recover them by clicking 'login' and then clicking the "Forgotten password?" button), or
call us on 0203 542 2400 to pay over the phone or arrange sending us a cheque. We will then be able to continue processing {!Contact.FirstName}’s application.
We wouldn’t want the cost to stop {!Contact.FirstName} taking part, so if finding the money is a problem, we may be able to help. Please log in to your online account, go to the payment section and select the option to ask for financial assistance. Alternatively, give us a call and we will be happy to advise you.
Yours sincerely,
The NCS Team - The Challenge
